name: MDLVoxelIndexExtent
desc: The corner voxel indices defining a solid rectangular volume of voxels. Used by the voxelIndexExtent property and voxels(within:) method.

items.name: var maximumExtent: MDLVoxelIndex
items.desc: The highest x, y, and z coordinates in the volume.

items.name: var minimumExtent: MDLVoxelIndex
items.desc: The lowest x, y, and z coordinates in the volume.
